bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: These are the most boring personal fireworks you can buy.

roman_candle.description: Ever have a roman candle fight?

sparklers.description: Also boring, used to distract children and send off newly weds.

mortar_mine.description: It kind of looks like a giant campfire!

bang_snap.description: Throw these at people you hate so they can hate you right back.

party_popper.name: Party Poppers
party_popper.description: Those lame poppers you use at parties that don't actual give anyone any joy.

fireworks.description: If they were considered high explosives, we'd all be dead.

dynamite.description: Uses include: catching that pesky road runner and building demolitions.

hydrogen.name: Hydrogen
hydrogen.description: Come into contact with this and you're done. BYEEE!

atom.description: We won't have to worry about pollution, because we'll all be dead.

kim_jung.name: The Kim Jung Un
kim_jung.description: Mostly a threat, but who knows.

stage_radiation.name: Tank Top
stage_radiation.description: This weapon is also called Teller Ulam weapons and can be of different types depending upon whether they are fission fusion or fission fusion fission bombs.
